name: MARIAS (itch)
description:
Submitted to the Rio de Janeiro section of Game Jam Plus!

Help Maria Quitéria, a military fighter from the Brazilian War of Independence on her journey for freedom. After her father forbid her from serving in the army, Maria Quitéria ran away from home, dressed herself as a man and joined the troops to fight for Brazil's independence.

A narrative-driven, single-player action game with a strong Brazilian woman and a touching story of self-discovery.
